data.text: A small piece of candy shaped like a kernel of corn.

data.text: A <xref>confection</xref> of <xref>sugar</xref> and <xref>corn syrup</xref> supposed to resemble a <xref>kernel</xref> of <xref>maize</xref>.

data.text: a small yellow and white candy shaped to resemble a kernel of corn
